attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned call on the Dept. of Health to open talks with Birmginham and Solihull NHS trust to reverse their decision to close Solihull Hospital Dementia Ward (ward 10)

Here in Solihull we have an ageing population and we request local access to the very best dementia care.

The vast majority of those with Dementia are elderly and increasing their travel demands is not acceptable.

Save Solihull Hospital Dementia Ward
